definition: to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳

sentences.english: Concepcion was the city closest to the epicenter of the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 康塞普西翁是離地震震央最近的城市。

sentences.english: The damages are limited to the area around the hypocenter.
sentences.chinese: 目前災區範圍僅限於震央周圍的地區。

sentences.english: Its epicenter was 19.6 km east of Nanao.
sentences.chinese: 這次地震的震央是在南澳東方十九點六公里處。

sentences.english: The focus of the earthquake is ninety miles from our city.
sentences.chinese: 這次地震的震央在距我市九十英里的地方。

definition: powerful earthquake/abbr. for 強烈地震|强烈地震
Hualien County on the east coast of Taiwan

deep earthquake (with epicenter more than 300 km deep)
Hualien, city and county on the east coast of Taiwan

Taitung city in southeast Taiwan, capital of Taitung county
